column4: Hello, How can I disable the message  "This session is running as privileged user." When logon as root. Note: I understand the risk involved in running GUI on root privileged.
either you know it on your own or you can't. #ubuntu won't help you making your system insecure
take it as a hint that you're doing a very very stupid thing
we respect your view too, you are on your own. HAND
